lenders.name: Mindi & Jadon
lenders.loan_because: We want to be the change that we wish to see in the world

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I'm no longer participating with Kiva because Tanzania took all my money and didn't pay it back.  I don't know what I was thinking... Tanzania, seriously?

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: Because I truly believe this is the way to change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to help people make their home ownership dreams a reality.

lenders.name: Hollie
lenders.loan_because: To help others help themselves

lenders.name: Monique
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: Everyone can use a hand that can lift up instead of a hand out only!
lenders.occupational_info: Teach, train, motivate and inspire youth to achieve straight "A's" in the school of life!

lenders.name: Juan Jose
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have what I need. Giving is an important part of my life's mission ( Help, Inspire , Give).

lenders.name: Morgan
lenders.loan_because: we should all be the change we wish to see in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in sales but fortunately work for a company that is dedicated to helping non profits, like Kiva, succeed.

lenders.name: San Roque High School
lenders.loan_because: We have a great opportunity to be educated and we care.
lenders.occupational_info: We help translate loans from Spanish. To see our hard work, go to the LEND page and change the Status tab from "In Need" to "All". Then type in "San Roque High School" and click Search.

lenders.name: Charlene
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need, and I love to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I help lead an eye surgery clinic and surgery center where we do many cataract surgeries every year.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: To share a little of the good fortune I have had in my life.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: Communications Manager

lenders.name: Jewelia
lenders.loan_because: It's a way helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: Wife, Mom, singer, songwriter

lenders.name: Ampsca
lenders.loan_because: I loan because i am blessed to be able to.

lenders.name: Oscar
lenders.loan_because: I like to help People

lenders.name: BMIGaming.Com
lenders.occupation: Selling Arcade Games, Amusement & Vending Machines
lenders.loan_because: At BMIGaming.com, we strongly believe in social entrepreneurship, and in lending assistance to those who are willing to help themselves. And we fully support microlending organizations like KIVA that help turn the poverty-stricken globally into self-sustaining individuals with dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: We sell FUN - And help bring smiles to people across the world, while running the "World's Largest Gaming Marketplace" for both commercial and residential arcade game clients in over 90 countries worldwide.

lenders.name: Larry and Jenny
lenders.loan_because: We are excited about Kiva because we can make an immediate impact by  reaching out to someone who wants to work toward a better life.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: I help couples learn how to have more connected and better relationships

lenders.name: Marisha Nowak
lenders.loan_because: To connect to my global family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a sales agent. All the products represented conserve water, fertilizer, energy and/or labor.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I believe we all need to help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I follow the Jewish religion to help repair the world.  That is why I made this loan

lenders.name: Alisa & Guy
lenders.loan_because: We can make an impact in someone's life - even if the loan is not a large amount of money.

lenders.name: Mou
lenders.loan_because:
"The best portion of a good man's life; His little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and of love" -William Wordsworth

The quote above is not completely relevant to this situation...but it captures some of the spirit.

It is a simple way to be involved.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I help people become emotionally healthy and happy

lenders.name: Gerry
lenders.loan_because: I want to share what I have been given.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired school health care worker.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I have so much and would like to share.

lenders.name: Lynda and Matt
lenders.loan_because: We want to see families thrive and create a feeling of security for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Preservation Properties
lenders.loan_because: I've always believed in  'act locally, think globally.' Now, with Kiva, one can easily 'act globally, think locally'.
lenders.occupational_info: EcoBroker working to make Sustainable Properties an affordable reality for everyone.

lenders.name: Heide and Lynn
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others, who are trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info:
Lynn does mammography (xray)
Hedie works with developmentally disabled deaf adults

lenders.name: Holland
lenders.loan_because: "An ounce of practice is worth more than tons of preaching." Mohandas Gandhi
lenders.occupational_info: I work with students and teachers in an urban school district within Houston, Texas.

lenders.name: k.l
lenders.loan_because: it feels good to help people help themselves

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others, and make any changes that "I" can help with, and I know if "I" can help today it was a good day, and tomorrow will be even better!
lenders.occupational_info:
I am in a career change myself, and
I quit a job that I was at for 7 years.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to support women in their efforts to become self-sustaining

lenders.name: Kristina
lenders.loan_because: I've been fortunate enough to have had people who gave of their time and mentored me because they saw potential.  This is my way of saying thank you to them for that faith, and to try to do my part to make a difference to someone also.
lenders.occupational_info: I primarily manage both small and large scale projects for a global wireless software company.

lenders.name: notDelilah
lenders.loan_because: One person can make a difference.  And helping others keeps you young.

lenders.name: Susie
lenders.loan_because: I know how empowering it is to start a small business and would like to help others do the same.

lenders.name: CAV
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy... even though I'm not wealthy, I can make a difference.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I am a single mother who has struggled for years to make ends meet...recently I had to stop working due to illness but am grateful that I live in Canada with universal medical and wonderful benefits...so I believe it is my duty as a citizen of the world to share what little I have...
lenders.occupational_info: I worked many years as a Chaplain (minister) in the school system...helping teenagers through crisis and trying to give them a sense of meaning and purpose in their lives...as well as a sense of their responsibility to help others less fortuante.

lenders.name: Bruce & Cheri
lenders.loan_because: We love to travel and have many of our greatest memories from travel in countries that need the help and opportunity that Kiva is providing.    We have a very busy and wonderful life in the San Francisco Bay area and are always looking for ways where we can be more involved and give.  I (Bruce) have been very fascinated by the simple brilliance of the micro lending approach to giving since I first heard of it a few years ago and have been looking for a way to get involved.  Kiva was the perfect opportunity for us to take the first step.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: What an exciting way to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Responsible for the regulatory compliance in a small bank.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I want my children to learn to love and share with others.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing for me to do
lenders.occupational_info: Help people Buy or Sell Homes

lenders.name: Roz & Bill
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world and help others to achieve their Dreams!   Sharing the Blessings we have been given is our goal!

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I want to support small entrepruener efforts in manufacturing.
lenders.occupational_info: I find suppliers all over the world and work with them to develop their production methods and business.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Paralegal. Legal advocate.

lenders.name: richard
lenders.loan_because: im a small business
lenders.occupational_info: we repair refrigrators and other appliances  like washers and dryers ect.

lenders.name: CHRISTINA
lenders.occupation: FULL TIME MOTHER OF 4 AND COLLEGE STUDENT

lenders.name: Jessie
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people

lenders.name: Zana
lenders.loan_because: it allows me the opportunity to pool my funds with other lenders, which can then be used to make a profound difference in the lives of those who otherwise would never qualify for a conventional loan.  It's knowing that most people around the world, given a chance, can excel.
lenders.occupational_info: Now that I am retired, my work is easy, ...  it's being the best wife, mother, friend and Oma that I can be.

lenders.name: Haruko
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to do something to change the world.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I design websites for small businesses.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: This is an amazing grassroots effort to give people a hand up, and though I love giving hand outs too, this seems that it will have a life long impact and make a difference for people.  We are all connected.  Let's help each other!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people with terminal illness and their families. I work as part of a team that helps them cope with grief & loss and assists them in dying well.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: it will help others- we are so blessed in our lives- "to whom much is given, much is expected"
lenders.occupational_info: I stay home and take care of my daughters.  I also try to help friends and the larger community.

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help make a difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because:
Everyone in this world deserves a chance to succeed.

My favorite quote about kindnes:

"When you are kind to others, it not only changes you, it changes the world."
                                                 Harold Kushner
lenders.occupational_info: The most rewarding job in the world.

lenders.name: Grant
lenders.loan_because: This is doing the right thing.
lenders.occupational_info: Computers

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: "We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give." -- Winston Churchill

lenders.name: Juliet
lenders.loan_because: It gives me joy to help women help themselves and others through their businesses.

lenders.name: Paris
lenders.loan_because: I believe all people need is a little help, a little boost, an opportunity to better themselves. At the end, they all do it by themselves and the credit is all theirs!

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because:
"If you think of life as like a big pie, you can try to hold the whole pie and kill yourself trying to keep it, or you can slice it up and give some to the people around you, and you still have plenty left for yourself."
-Jay Leno
lenders.occupational_info:
I enjoy working as a docent(volunteer educator) to help children and adults learn about and better appreciate the natural wonders of our local forests, rivers and sea.

My paying job is at the local humane society where I do office work and lots of the other tasks involved in fundraising, promoting our spay/neuter program and of course finding new, loving homes for the county's unwanted dogs and cats.

lenders.name: Oscar
lenders.loan_because: I don't need another graphic tee

lenders.name: Leila, Jim, & Jason
lenders.loan_because: This is an excellent way of fighting poverty at the grassroots level.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: Imagine what this world would be like if everyone made a loan!

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I simply want to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a property management company in Huntington Beach, California, USA

lenders.name: Pam Sue
lenders.loan_because: When I learned about Kiva, I had no choice but to come here - my heart would not take NO for an answer!

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: I want to help empower others.
lenders.occupational_info:
I teach science to middle school students.  I promote conservation of wildlife.  I'm looking for sustainable renewable solutions to cooking fuel problem in the DR Congo.  It causes villagers to rely on charcoal obtained illegally from protected wildlife areas which are home to the endangered mountain gorilla.  If you have any suggestions, please check out the gorilla protection blog on wildlifedirect.org.
Also check out http://www.workingvillages.org/main.html

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: Although I am not wealthy, I am lucky to live in a relatively wealthy country. It is wonderful to be able to do something to help someone struggling to make their life better, despite my limited resources.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired with a medical disability.  For many years, I was an Executive Assistant in a lawyer's office.

lenders.name: Isabella
lenders.loan_because: My Mommy wants to teach me how to help others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am only 8 months old, and I just hang out with my family. But, I am learning new things every day. Mommy and Daddy want to start me out in helping others in need.

lenders.name: Jaime
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I feel so fortunate and blessed in my life.   I may not have much but I have enough!   I also love the fact that my sons already know how good it is to help others.  It feels great to be able to do something for another person no matter how small. We all make a difference in every life we touch whether we know it or not.  Pay it forward....and it will come back many times over.  This site is all about that and I love that!
lenders.occupational_info: I have 2 boys, 5 and 3 so work is 24 hours! I am also an office manager at a surgery center.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe that people want to do well for themselves; they just need a little help to get there.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 12-14 year old children mathematics.

lenders.name: Sharnay
lenders.loan_because: I have been in a place in my life when I have needed money to get back on my feet.  I now find myself with a bit of money to loan and am happy that I can help someone who has a dream and a vision.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the General Manager for a silk screener.  We create custom printed t-shirts for schools, companies, bands and other organizations.

lenders.name: Jodie
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of contribution.  I love knowing that I'm making a difference in someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with organizations to develop their leaders and instill the habits to make them successful.

lenders.name: jayne
lenders.loan_because: "to know that one life has breathed easier because I have lived.  This is to have succeeded."  (Ralph Waldo Emerson)

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: we are all connected and I love being part of a team that gives and helps each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I train service dogs for children with disabilites. They help improve the quality of life for the child in many ways including putting a smile on their face, and I smile doing the work as well. It feeds my soul.

lenders.name: Merylin
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to want to do something that can better your family and have a positive effect on the community.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home and raise my daughter and take care of the household while my husband works.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I am so pleased seeing the success of people all over the world with a little bit of help from others.  I am so blessed and am happy to share with others
lenders.occupational_info: I am a court lawyer in civil cases, e.g. lawsuits in U.S. courts

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I'm a business owner, and I want to help others like me all over the world, one person at a time.

lenders.name: Donnetta
lenders.occupational_info: I work with women who are self-injurers. There is only one organization in the US for them to seek help if they have the proper insurance, so I have designed agency using a holistic approach to help these girls. I am in need of funding so I can get this off the ground. I have a list of girls waiting for this to be open so they can heal.

lenders.name: elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I saw a "Oprah" show taking about giving and learned about KIVA. I was so blown away by these people that generally have very little and still are so brave to go out and try and better themselves. I think of myself as being very fortunate and oh so grateful to have what I have. I can't think of anything better than trying to help someone else realize their dream of being self-sufficient. This is truly a wonderful organization.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: I share my wealth and happiness with others through loans i make.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: Someone is in need and I can help.  It's as simple and honest as that. If I can help someone extablish or continue a business to take care of their family, or themself, it would be sad, not to.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: my job is to love.
lenders.occupational_info: work on programs for television

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: The universe has given me an incredible opportunity to earn wealth through entrepreneurship and I believe in giving back.
lenders.occupational_info: At its essence, all business is the same, its fulfilling a customer's need and doing so in a way that creates a profit.   I just happen to have a specific skill set and market knowledge that allows me to do through the creation of "intellectual property" driven businesses that are scalable and create lots of profits.  Essentially, instead of selling "shoes", I sell "ideas" and once I've got the idea sales channel in place, I can sell an infinite # of the same "idea" at no cost.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.occupational_info: I represent individuals charged with crimes who cannot afford to hire an attorney.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I am able too at this time and I want to help people succeed and make them a little happier if I can.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I can.  In all honesty, if I can help someone who is able and willing to work to improve their life, but just needs a little help getting started then I am more than happy to do it.

lenders.name: raymundo
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be aware of our shared humanity
lenders.occupational_info: I.T. fixed computers, network and stuff.  It is what pays my bills and allows me to do what I enjoy (outdoors, travel, food) life

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I can help. Maybe not a lot, but I'm glad that Kiva helps me to do something.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and research in computing - mostly on the "people" side of the technology.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because:
it feels great to help someone in need and to let them know that others in the world want to make
their lives better.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I want to live my life generously~

lenders.name: paulette
lenders.loan_because: i don't have a lot of $ and yet i want to help everyone.  so this is a way to donate a small amount and make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: for years i tried to lose weight and then i found out i could be a model for plus size women.  i started at 40.  i am now 61 and have had a small successful career.  in the past, while i was raising my children, I worked as a restaurant manager, car salesperson, bartender, waitress and accountant and this is by far more fun.

lenders.name: satomi
lenders.loan_because: There is no them.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: Helping is a gift those of us fortunate to have extra money are blessed with to share with others.
lenders.occupational_info: When not working I love NASCAR, Boston Red Sox and New England Patriots. I ran my first and only marathon in 2006 in Chicago. I have run several 1/2 marathons.

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: I can...and I hope to make a difference in someone's life. Dream big!...

lenders.name: Sara & Gilbert
lenders.loan_because: This is one way we can share what we are blessed to have with others.
lenders.occupational_info: Sara teaches English as a Second Language to immigrants. Gilbert is a Registered Nurse in the Emergency Department.

lenders.name: Sophie
lenders.loan_because: Everyone wants the best for their families.  Financial security is critical for this.  It may help give peace of mind, and hopefully engender peace for all.  Despite those lofty goals, I just hope to alleviate some worry.
lenders.occupational_info: Activist.

lenders.name: Vy Han
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of knowing where the money I loan goes.  I don't like giving money blindly to just any charity w/o seeing it effectively used. This, however, is different.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a very poor student trying my best to become a doctor someday in the field of oncology.  My family and I don't make much money and we make-do with what we have.  I have a part-job as well while going to school in order to pay for my expenses.  However, whatever money I have left, I want to help people with it.

lenders.name: Lemuel
lenders.loan_because: I know how it feels to start..back then,  God knows back when the dinosaurs roamed Los Angeles, CA. I too started, and no one believed in me but myself. I made it, life is wonderful..Now its time to give back ....
lenders.occupational_info: I am your typical immigrant in the United States that started life in America with practically nothing. My dad , mom and me came here with 5 dollars in our pocket back in 1979..with a hard work life is now wonderful...it is just a matter of work ethic..

lenders.name: Kristine
lenders.loan_because: I am a student struggling in college to be able to one day make a nice living for my family.  I feel that I can connect with these people due to that.
lenders.occupational_info: Studying, going to class, homework, and also working a part-time job in computer technical support.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is important to give back. Helping your fellow man can only make the world a better place for everyone.

lenders.name: Stefan
lenders.occupation: Petty officer in the Danish Navy

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because:
I can think of few things more rewarding than to help build a better future! 

Knowing I can make a difference gives me hope and energy to keep working hard for a better future for all of us. Funny how giving can be so rewarding!
lenders.occupational_info: I do writing and copy-editing in the coorporate world, banking mostly.

lenders.name: LINDA
lenders.loan_because: I LOVE HELPING PEOPLE THAT WILL WORK. THEREFORE, IT HELPS THE WHOLE COMMUNITY.
lenders.occupational_info: I SEW. I MAKE QUILTED ITEMS AND ALSO TAKE IN HEMMING UP PANTS AND SKIRTS. ITS GIVES ME SOMETHING TO DO AND MAKE EXTRA MONEY.

lenders.name: Norma
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in an era when you were expected to create your future through personal effort and hard work.  I applaud the desire of the loan applicants to improve their circumstances.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: In order to make a difference in the world.  Although a small amount its the easiest way as an individual to make a difference.

lenders.name: candace
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell on e-bay and travel with my husband ,  he works mostly at power plants putting in fire protection.  So I takee pictures of where we live.

lenders.name: Jenifer
lenders.loan_because: I have so much to be grateful for! There is enough to go around.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I am unbelievably blessed!  Having so much, I want to help others have an opportunity to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach  at a university.

lenders.name: Jessica Foley
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a psychotherapist for women!

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I believe pigs can fly.
lenders.occupational_info: I use my photographs to create fashion marketing products.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I feel blessed to be able to make someone else's life a little better.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed.

lenders.name: Cambialaria
lenders.occupational_info: We are a vocal ensemble in Seattle, Washington. We redirect 100% of our  performance fees and donations to the world's poor.

lenders.name: Bobby
lenders.loan_because: I like to help.

lenders.name: Lorine
lenders.loan_because: it allows me to help improve other people's lives as well as my own.
lenders.occupational_info: I design brand experiences.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I give a percentage of my income to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a certified life coach and speaker specializing in helping women fulfill their potential.

lenders.name: Girls Gotta Eat
lenders.loan_because: I've been privileged to be born in this country with an abundance of opportunities.  I would like to give back and help someone else lift themselves up.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to find ways to use my 20 yrs of experience in fashion after leaving the corporate world. Consulting, Ebay and blogging.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: we should all help people get a start or pursue a dream.
lenders.occupational_info: a lot of important work that seems mindless in context of what most go through, but I know it is an important part of the wheel of life.

lenders.name: Matthew C
lenders.loan_because: I like seeing ambitious people succeed, and I hate to see them punished for failure.  I've barely earned this money, anyhow.
lenders.occupational_info: Type type type.  Think think think.  Type type type.  Coffee.  Pee.  Think Think Think.  Type Type Type.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I want other people to be able to take advantage of the opportunities they find.  I want to give someone hope.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a listener and a watcher.  I sit quietly and write down what people say on a little machine in a special language or code.  That code is then sent to a computer that translates it into English.  It is a great job where I meet new people every day. It has great challenges and great flexibility.

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: My life has been blessed and I want to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to help people save for their retirement. Now in my retirement, I want to help save people.

lenders.name: Megan M.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people do things!

lenders.name: Franz
lenders.loan_because: everyone should cultivate loving-kindness, compassion, taking joy in other's success, and treating everyone equally. These are the four sublime states of mind.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an educator. Knowledge is a gift that enables the students to become self-sufficient and make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: stay at home mom to seven month and 11 year old while partner goes to college

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic opportunity to help someone make a difference in their lives and the lives of their family. It takes an adventurous spirit to start your own business. I admire that and feel honoured to be able to help in this small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that manufactures lamp and socket assemblies that go into the instrument panels of cars. I am responsible for all manufacturing departments including maintaining production levels to meet customer requirements.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful opportunity to help my fellow business owners around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I have been in business for 31 years.  We now have a pet shop that we started 20 years ago.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I am excited about the opportunity to give to women who, through their strength and determination, are finding ways to help themselves and their communities. Their efforts will have long-standing and long-reaching affects on their families and communities.

lenders.name: David
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professor and an entrepreneur (www.versive.com).  My web service, Vroom®, services small business in the United States.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a good reason not to.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a postgraduate student at Harris Manchester College, University of Oxford.

lenders.name: Robley
lenders.loan_because: I am also an Entrepreneur and many of these individuals do not have the same opportunities that I enjoy in America. lenders.occupational_info: I'm a serial entrepreneur, owning several businesses myself.

lenders.name: Wendy and Jonathan

lenders.occupation: Executive Director of a youth charity

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: To give is to receive.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: "For unto whomsoever much is given, of him shall be much required."

lenders.occupational_info: We are just  kids who live in a small town in Texas with only 1100 residents.

lenders.loan_because:
i need to under go limb lengthening operation for that i require $20,000/-. i promise to repay the loan in 6 years.

lenders.occupational_info: I help people and businesses resolve disputes and represent them in court if they can't

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: We should all be helping each other out.

lenders.name: Jackie

lenders.occupational_info: I remanufacture cartridges for all types of printers.  By doing this we are helping the environment while saving the end user money.  My husband and I started our business in 1993.

lenders.name: Steph
lenders.loan_because: It's important to give back.

lenders.name: Jay

It makes me feel good to help people develop these businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: My background is in agriculture, I like pig and grain farming. I currently help scientists and doctors develop new human drugs.

lenders.loan_because: people will understand the gospel of Christ through the love and generosity of people who know him.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a pastor.  I show young people the love of Christ, and try to love others with them.

lenders.name: michelle and corey
lenders.occupation: Stay at home Mom and computer consultant
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world, because all of us share the same planet.

lenders.name: Penny
lenders.loan_because: I was married, had 2 children, and was divorced with no job skills at the age of 25. Donating to Kiva is a way to give back to others who are owning their destiny and working hard to support themselves & their family.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because:
My life is so blessed that I want to share those blessings with others in need.
"Be the change you want to see in the world." Mahatma Gandhi
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 2nd grade teacher in a classroom of 20 boys and girls.  My students are between 7-8 years old.  I teach them reading, math, science, social studies, character education and many social skills. I love what I do!

lenders.loan_because: I can and should. What a great organization!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office, on a stage (performer) and around my house. It's all good.

lenders.loan_because: Pay it forward...

lenders.loan_because: Like being able to know about who receives the loans

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: Life is about giving!  May each of us extend our blessings to those in need!

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: Opportunity is a gift.  The spirit of the Kiva organization is inspiring and I am excited for the opportunity to be a part of it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother of an amazing nine year old girl.  My career began as an elementary school teacher, but now I work in the wild world of startups at TechCrunch.

lenders.name: renee
lenders.loan_because: God.
lenders.occupational_info: that would be difficult.  Everyone does not own a computer!

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: I have so much and they have so little - not just.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful feeling to make a difference in someones life.

lenders.name: Dan and Tina
lenders.loan_because: We would like to provide opportunity for people around the world to do what they love and improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Dan manufactures chemicals that are used to make medicines and other products. Tina manages the household and takes care of their 2 children.

lenders.name: Brian and Jemma
lenders.loan_because: I loan through Kiva because I believe it is the best way to get the most money directly to the people that can most benefit from it. I make loans because I realize I am extremely lucky to have been born into the place and time that I was. But for an accident of fate, I would be needing the assistance I can easily give now.
lenders.occupational_info: I do emergency mental health evaluations. I meet with people who are experiencing a personal crisis and I try to help determine that person can saty safe and get the help they need.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I am a business owner myself.  I have everything I need.  Opportunity is a gift, and giving to fulfill a dream makes me happy!  Everyone needs a little help from time to time.
lenders.occupational_info: We prepare land for buildings and homes.  I work in the office and do accounting and billing for the business.

lenders.name: Karan
lenders.loan_because: A great way for one person to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I taught elementary school in a rural area for 30 years. Now retired.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I really like that the funds are going directly to those in need of a hand up not a hand out.  I respect and admire these entrepreneurs for their hard work and determination to provide a good life for their families.

lenders.name: cheryl
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do and it makes me happy knowing I can help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Internet ventures

lenders.name: angelina
lenders.loan_because: As a struggeling musician for 15 years, I have drained all my finances just to obtain little items that make a big difference. For example, guitar, keyboard, sound equipment, etc.  To date the only item I have been able to obtain on my own was my Ovation Guitar and it took me 5 months to pay for it.  I am a single 31 yr old woman, high school graduate and currently trying to obtain a grant to go to the University of Phoenix, online course.  Coming from a poor family has had it's hardships but I have learned to work for what I want.  I needed a website badly (all musicians do) but since I could not afford to pay hundreds and hundreds of dollars to get one, I learned the software myself and built the website on my own.  It would so nice, and I would be forever grateful if there was some kind of help available.  With the right funds I can record in the studio, make a demo, send it out to the right people, pay for my songwriting which is a huge expense, and continue in my path of making my dreams a reality.  I have a lazy eye which has debilitated me.  I was working as a legal secretary until 4 years ago.  Then I started the web design on the side,...however my left eye is now legally blind and it is effecting my ability to work on a computer at a desk.  I have to minimize that time as much as possible or I spend my days dizzy and sick.  Not many jobs in this town and my income is less than $400.00 a month.  I am forever grateful to those who can help.  Thank you so very much!
lenders.occupational_info: Singer, songwriter, musician and passionate lover of music....seeks funds to continue dream....  disability enables the ability to work to support career.  Anyone that can help, I am forever grateful.

lenders.name: Francisca
lenders.loan_because: we need to empower women all over the globe!
lenders.occupational_info:
i work in the Environmental Health Coalition.
forming a youth group in our community to fight environmental racism

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I thoroughly respect and admire the people Kiva lends to.  Even though, in many cases, they have limited means and are often living in unstable regions, the vast majority of them repay their obligations.
lenders.occupational_info: I remind people of their commitments and hold them to their deadlines.  Basically, I am a professional pesterer.

lenders.name: Jennifer

lenders.occupational_info: I hire technology and engineering consultants to work on projects across the United States.

lenders.name: Vino and Canvas
lenders.loan_because: We want to do what we can to help!  As a growing small business we understand the time, effort, and hardwork needed to succeed!  We enjoy knowing we are helping someone achieve their goals and dreams.  Kiva has created something amazing and we am thankful we can be a part of it.
lenders.occupational_info: Vino & Canvas is a mobile business offering painting parties at a variety of local establishments around the Phoenix Valley. We\'ll also bring the party to your home or office. Partygoers create their own masterpiece in an entertaining atmosphere with the assistance of a talented art instructor. All supplies are included! Grab your friends and join us for enjoyable evening you’ll never forget! Get your artistic buzz on!

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because it's a mitzvah - responsibility - in Judaism.  I love humanity.  

"For I desire kindness, not sacrifice." (Hos. 6:6)
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Hebrew and Judaism to children in Jewish day schools.

lenders.name: Bruce Fan Sweden
lenders.loan_because: I believe that what comes around goes around.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people in need with e.g. legal advices and court proceedings.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: ...too often, we wait for tomorrow to lend a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I help plan and coordinate inspection and maintenance services on our electricity-producing customers' gas turbines and generators.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who show a desire to work hard to improve their economic position.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to operate heavy equipment in order to obtain employment in the construction industry.

lenders.name: JLH
lenders.loan_because: I can.  This is what IT's all about, doing what we can to help others.  I have so many blessings; why not share with the world?
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a group of doctors.  I work to make sure that the health insurance companies pay our patients'  medical bills.

lenders.name: Annamarie
lenders.loan_because: Loaning just a little makes a big difference.  Together we can change the world!
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a large university as an assistant to a dean.  Mainly, I schedule meetings for her and make sure she has everything she needs to make decisions.  Next year, I hope to start a PhD program in counseling psychology.

lenders.name: jason, cheri, & zev
lenders.loan_because: Kiva made it possible!

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.loan_because: I believe that there should be a sharing of resources amongst the whole of earth's inhabitants.  God has given me more than others not so I can horde it all to myself, but rather to give of my surplus that others may benefit.  Lending is an exciting way to let others become more involved in the commerce in their neighborhood.
lenders.occupational_info: Money flows in and out through businesses and also to a much smaller degree families and individuals.  Businesses need a person to keep track of the money that comes and goes in the business on a daily, weekly, monthly and annual basis.  The business owners benefit from reports that I prepare that show them how their business in doing - sort of like a doctor listening to the heart of a patient to get an understanding of what is going on inside the body.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Phillip
lenders.loan_because: Why not?
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a 911 dispatcher and have to deal with stressful situations on a daily basis and in most cases people that I deal with aren't happy and usually not very nice.

lenders.name: Elizabeth n Jennie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the KIVA system is the most promising way to make a difference in people's lives on a larger scale.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my daughter who is ill and substitute teach on occasion

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: To help people trying to make an honest living. People trying to provide for themselves, their family, and to better their communities.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: It's a self sustaining exchange that I think is making a real change.

lenders.name: thomas
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone make their life better.

lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do - We are  very fortunate and believe it's our duty to pay it forward.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired government worker.  I enjoy crocheting, knitting, baking PIZZELLE cookies, gardening, bird watching and linedancing.

lenders.name: Zach
lenders.loan_because: People need it more than I do
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English in high school

lenders.name: Linda & Guy
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people in need who are working to help themselves.

lenders.name: Morgan
lenders.loan_because: Since I was child I have always wanted to give back to someone in need. I am big in giving not money (until recently) but my friendship, time, and just help.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to work for a car dealership until I got married.  Now I have the privledge of not having to work and to just take care of my home, family, and animals.

lenders.name: Zach
lenders.loan_because: As his mom writing, I'll just say he is amazing. The minute he heard about Kiva he ran to his room and dumped out his piggy bank and we counted it together.  I told him he could buy a toy if he wanted with his money (praying he wouldn't smile and say "OK!")... and, of course he said "No way Mom, I want to help!).
lenders.occupational_info: Kindergarten is hard work.  We are learning how to read, but man this English language is really confusing!

lenders.name: C and H
lenders.loan_because: It is simply the right thing to do.

lenders.name: CAROLINE
lenders.loan_because: I admire the people featured on this site who work so hard for their families

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: it feels like I am making a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a jazz singer and vocal coach.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I want the people of the world to live a better life, to be well fed and happy.

lenders.name: Stephenie
lenders.loan_because: I have SO much, and I need to remind myself of that...

lenders.name: lululovesbella
lenders.loan_because: ...there but by the grace of god...
lenders.occupational_info: i do accounting in film production - i handle budgets for the  building of  sets for big budgeted films

lenders.name: kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance to see their dreams and hopes come true.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of patients in my office and in the hospital.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I believe we have to pay it forward, in whatever manner we can.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.occupation: Director of faith formation at a Catholic church

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because:
Help the people, I will. 
Trust in the force.
lenders.occupational_info: Jedi Master, Rebel Ship Levitator,

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because:
I care about others. I believe that this is a great way for people to lift themselves out of poverty.

 I have also been poor in my life, and I appreciate all the help I got along the way. Now I am able to pass on the gifts I got.
lenders.occupational_info: I help operate free schools for 13,000 children 5-18 years of age. Education changes lives.

lenders.name: Hai
lenders.loan_because:
Aloha!  We're living in the most prosperous and free country on earth. I feel that it is part of our duties to help brothers and sisters who are less fortune. These tokens are not a charity, but an encouragement to help entrepreneurs to achieve a higher level of self sufficiency and prosperity. 

Many wonderful things like these just don't happen;  You and I can make them happen now !!!
lenders.occupational_info: We all have the same biology....

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help out others.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I believe you have to give to get back....
lenders.occupational_info: I listen to employees and manage risk for our company.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I am currently able, and I like to share. I have had many opportunities to pursue my goals and dreams, and I hope in some small way I can help others do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and create web applications.  I am also a musician.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people around the world in a way that respects their ingenuity and integrity. I particularly am interested in helping my fellow sisters in retail around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the store manager of the largest retail store in Antarctica.

lenders.name: Katy
lenders.occupation: Director of Retail, Vosges Haut Chocolat
lenders.loan_because: I have had the great fortune of being able to lead, exercise entrepreneurship and help others and I want to give that same opportunity to other women in business.
lenders.occupational_info:
I run the retail division of a CHOCOLATE company!
The company I work for was founded by a woman and we support women's organizations and many green mission causes.
The mantra of our company is "travel the world through chocolate," so our owner and chocolatier creates chocolates that use ingredients from all over the world.  I felt like joining Kiva was  a great opportunity to exercise the values of my company while giving me an amazing opportunity to personally give back!

lenders.name: Tomoko
lenders.loan_because: I can give people a little help. I hope everyone will be happier than now.

lenders.name: Lars
lenders.occupational_info: Product Management for Mobile Software
